docs.text: djfedos GitHub profile | LinkedIn profile My name is Fedor Ivashchenko. I specialize in Test Automation. I work in YairDev . My projects Tasker tutorial Tasker is the most human-friendly automation tool in existence. Attend this tutorial to master Tasker from scratch. Devpod Tutorial Learn how to instantly prepare your environment for software development. djfedos-search docs | demo | source code A trie-based search suggestion engine implemented in Python. Demo web UI is written in pure JavaScript and backed with FastAPI. Tests are automated by means of GitHub actions. todo app A sandbox for test automation. GitHub repo contains dockerized cypress-based e2e tests of the dockerized app automated with GitHub Actions and Tasker. My contribution Devpod Devpod is a tool that allows quick setup of software development environment. My stack Python FastAPI Flask pytest coverage bash Docker Git GitHub Actions cypress JavaScript
